Frozen Berries (solid) - 1 cup (e.g., strawberries, blueberries, or raspberries)
Almond Milk (liquid) - 1/2 cup (or any milk of choice)
Fresh Fruits (solid) - 1/2 cup, sliced (e.g., kiwi, banana, or berries, for topping)
Chia Seeds (dry, small) - 1 tablespoon(optional, for topping)
